name: ccdi-ui-components
description: USWDS-compliant React components with full accessibility and government design standards

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: USWDS-compliant button component with 8+ variants including primary, secondary, outline, success, warning, danger, ghost, and link styles. Fully accessible with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: USWDS-compliant button group component with default and segmented variants. Supports multiple color schemes including blue, red, cyan, orange, gray, and outline styles. Fully accessible with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: USWDS-compliant alert component with variants for default, success, warning, danger, info, and emergency states. Includes proper ARIA roles and icon integration.

items.name: icon
items.title: Icon
items.description: USWDS-compliant icon component with Material Icons integration and proper accessibility features.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: USWDS-compliant badge component for status indicators and labels with proper color contrast and accessibility.

items.name: banner
items.title: Banner
items.description: USWDS-compliant banner component that identifies official websites of government organizations with .gov and .mil variants.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: USWDS-compliant breadcrumb navigation component showing the location of the current page in the site structure. Includes responsive behavior with mobile-optimized display and proper ARIA attributes for accessibility.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: USWDS-compliant input component with proper labeling, validation states, and accessibility features.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: USWDS-compliant label component with proper form association and accessibility features.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: USWDS-compliant select dropdown component with keyboard navigation and proper accessibility.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: USWDS-compliant separator component for visual content division with proper semantic markup.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: USWDS-compliant checkbox component with proper accessibility and form integration.

items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: USWDS-compliant accordion component with keyboard navigation and proper ARIA states.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: USWDS-compliant card component for content grouping and layout with proper semantic structure.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: USWDS-compliant dialog/modal component with focus management and accessibility features.

items.name: form
items.title: Form
items.description: USWDS-compliant form component with validation and accessibility features.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: USWDS-compliant pagination component with keyboard navigation and accessibility.

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: USWDS-compliant radio button group with proper accessibility and form integration.

items.name: search
items.title: Search
items.description: USWDS-compliant search input component with proper accessibility and keyboard support.

items.name: autocomplete
items.title: Autocomplete
items.description: USWDS-compliant autocomplete component providing users with search suggestions in real time. Based on the NCI Design System with full keyboard navigation, accessibility features, and configurable options including minimum character count, highlighting, and async search support.

items.name: chart
items.title: Chart Foundation
items.description: Base chart components with USWDS styling including ChartContainer, ChartTooltip, and ChartLegend. Provides the foundation for all chart types with government-compliant theming and accessibility features.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: USWDS-compliant table component with proper semantic markup and accessibility features.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A USWDS-compliant tooltip component that displays a short descriptive message when a user hovers or focuses on an element. Supports four positions (top, right, bottom, left) and is fully accessible with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: A context menu component that displays a menu when right-clicking on an element. Built with native HTML/CSS following USWDS design guidelines. Supports checkboxes, radio groups, submenus, shortcuts, and destructive actions.

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: A dropdown menu component that displays a list of actions or options when triggered. Built with native HTML/CSS following USWDS design guidelines. Supports checkboxes, radio groups, submenus, shortcuts, and destructive actions.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: A progress bar component that visually indicates the completion status of a task. Built with native HTML/CSS following USWDS design guidelines. Supports multiple variants (default, success, warning, error) and optional labels.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: USWDS-compliant avatar component for displaying user profile images with fallback initials. Supports multiple sizes and proper accessibility.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: USWDS-compliant textarea component for multi-line text input with proper labeling, validation states, and accessibility features.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: USWDS-compliant slider component for selecting a value or range of values. Supports single and multi-thumb sliders with keyboard navigation, step increments, and full accessibility features.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: USWDS-compliant switch/toggle component for binary choices. Built with native HTML/CSS following USWDS design guidelines with proper accessibility and keyboard support.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: USWDS-compliant tabs component for organizing content into multiple panels. Includes Tabs, TabsList, TabsTrigger, and TabsContent components with keyboard navigation and proper ARIA attributes.

items.name: header
items.title: Header
items.description: USWDS-compliant header block with navigation, search, and responsive design. Includes keyboard navigation and accessibility features.

items.name: footer
items.title: Footer
items.description: USWDS-compliant footer block with navigation links and proper semantic structure.

items.name: in-page-navigation
items.title: In-Page Navigation
items.description: USWDS-compliant in-page navigation component for section jumping and content organization.

items.name: utils
items.title: Utility Functions
items.description: Shared utility functions for class name merging and conditional styling used across USWDS components.

items.name: fonts
items.title: USWDS Fonts
items.description: Self-hosted variable fonts optimized for USWDS including Public Sans, Source Sans 3, Open Sans, Roboto Mono, Merriweather, and Poppins. Latin subset only, WOFF2 format for optimal performance (~1MB total).

items.name: nextjs-styles
items.title: USWDS Global Styles
items.description: Complete USWDS design system styles including Tailwind CSS v4 configuration, color tokens, typography system, and spacing. Government-compliant design tokens for accessible federal websites with Section 508 compliance.
